title: Jessica Knoll Wants to Correct the Record on Ted Bundy
description: In her new book, 'Bright Young Women,' the author sets out to prove that the notorious serial killer wasn't as smart or charming as history seems to believe.

title: Earth Is Mostly Outside Its ‘Safe Operating Space For Humanity,’ Study Warns
description: Scientists warn that six of the nine key signs of planetary health are out of whack. The other three are also headed in the wrong direction.

title: Utah GOP Sen. Mitt Romney Won’t Seek Reelection in 2024
description: The 76-year-old said the country is ready for new leadership. “Frankly, it’s time for a new generation of leaders," he said.

description: Cavalcante, 34, escaped from Chester County Prison on Aug. 31.

description: Russia's brutal war against Ukraine has impacted millions of people, not least children.

description: The storm that inundated the Libyan coast is the latest extreme weather event to carry some hallmarks of climate change, scientists say.

description: The aviation sector accounts for 13.9% of transportation emissions in the EU.

description: The trucking industry boomed during the pandemic, luring new drivers. Now, in some cases, those drivers are fighting debt and homelessness.

title: How We Chose the 2023 TIME100 Next
description: I first heard Wemimo Abbey speak in August at the inaugural TIME Impact House in Martha’s Vineyard. It was clear to everyone that night that Abbey’s is a story worth sharing. Together with Samir Goel, the two co-founders have built Esusu, a five-year-old company that helps Americans use their rental history to build credit scores.…

title: The History of Antisemitic Conspiracy Theories, from the Rothschilds to George Soros
description: An expert on conspiracy theories talks about antisemitism from the Rothschilds to George Soros.

title: Hulu’s The Other Black Girl Poses Tough Questions About Black Allyship in a White Workplace

title: Vladimir Putin and Kim Jong Un Meet at Remote Siberian Rocket Launch Facility
description: The decision to meet at Vostochny Cosmodrome suggests Kim is seeking Russian technical assistance for his efforts to develop military reconnaissance satellites.

title: The Best, Worst, and Most Dramatic Moments of the 2023 MTV VMAs
description: From epic Shakira and Diddy medleys to wins from Taylor Swift and Nicki Minaj, The VMAs offered ample performances and a dose of drama.
